CustomBehavior.Lua: function ShouldSell(itemName) for i=1,#ProtectedItems do if (string.find(string.lower(itemName), string.lower(ProtectedItems[i]))) then return false end end return true end function DynSell() if MerchantFrame:IsVisible()==true then if buffer==nil or buffer>4 then buffer=0 end; if ProtectedItems==nil then ProtectedItems = {'notset'} end; MerchantRepairAllButton:Click() if buffer<5 then for s=1,GetContainerNumSlots(buffer) do local n=GetContainerItemLink(buffer,s) if n then if ShouldSell(n) then UseContainerItem(buffer,s); end end end buffer=buffer+1 end end end;
